Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the entrance of the residential community below. There is a shop "Jiuyuan Tobacco and Liquor Store" next to the entrance. Thinking back on past Action Generations and objects you have seen, what should you approach next in order to get from your current location to your destination?  
choose:  
A. I approach the center of the road.  
B. I approach the "Jiuyuan Tobacco and Liquor Shop" sign on the highest point of the building.  
C. I approach the parking lot across the street.  
D. I approach the nearby street corner.  
E. I approach the residential roof.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: Approaching the nearby street corner is a logical step to navigate towards the entrance of the residential community. Street corners often provide better visibility and access to different paths, making it easier to locate specific landmarks such as the "Jiuyuan Tobacco and Liquor Store" next to the entrance.
